thread.section_title: The 2 Week Diet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The 2 Week Diet | www.2weekdiet.com
thread.title: Rajshri
thread.title_full: The 2 Week Diet reviewed by Rajshri

author: Rajshri
title: Rajshri
text:
I appreciate the sincere efforts of Brian Flatt to reach across to benefit so many people. I find the book very enlightening especially its scientific approach to dealing with the diet regimen and its benefits.
I especially liked the low carb and high fat combination for diet control. The 3 pound rule and the workout to avoid weight regain is another thing I loved about the book.
It is easier to lose all the benefits of this regimen if one does not follow up on it. All the other related topics on health like nutrients, water, metabolism, workouts, will power etc are really insightful and informative.
